VSTM q1 avg symphony week 65 scripts Q2 so far 86 and trending higher 385 increase QoQ so far In line with the 38 QoQ rev increase q4 2018 to q1 2019 Works out to 24 m rev if everything stays the same Q2 Same QoQ will lead to 32 m Q3 and 45 Q4 giving us 118 mil for 2019 in line w Higher end of guidance Now the question is can 38 growth QoQ scriptsrevenue keep upProbably Will 2019 118 mil rev pop this stock probably not Can the sales team ramp up numbers at a higher paceWell see I guess but Im not 100 sold on thatI think it will be extremely difficult to miss guidance and there are surprisespartnershipstrials that can act as catalysts towards the upside so Im still holding
